topics.body:
Random funny thing 
I never really had a great throw
So whenever we played dodge ball in school, I decided I would just stand as a target to distract the other side
But despite the fact that I just stood still, barely anyone ever threw at me

Although when they did throw I was an expert dodger
And I always tried to do cool lean back dodges, still staying in the same spot
